name: webdev2-demos
description: This is a project for the Web Dev 2 class at [SAIT](https://sait.ca). It is a simple event management system that allows users to create and displays community events. It is built using [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/), [React](https://reactjs.org/), [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/), and [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/).
